short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display a resizeable and draggable timer on your browser screen

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension displays a resizeable and draggable timer on your browser screen. It is useful for users who would like a timer for their browser activities.
The following features are available on this extension;
- Timer
- Stopwatch
- Clock
- Dark mode
- Resizeable
- Draggable
- Fixed to the current page
